note:
Lawyer + Politics PhD student @ Berkeley. Interested in governance, law, political economy, democracy, history, and epistemology/philosophy of science. Taoist.

Prev: Berkeley Law, Cambridge, Trinity College Dublin and Mitchell Scholarship (of course), and GA Tech alum. Worked at Crowdpac, Palantir, and MapLight. Law stuff at Open Markets Institute, California Lawyers for the Arts, and LPE Blog. Former theoretical physicist and journalist.

Based in beautiful San Francisco, California, USA
